channel.title: Parents (UPDATED)
channel.description:
As you may or may not experience, in life your parents might split up, and unfortunatley for me, mine have.
Well, my mum has moved on and has found herself a nice boyfriend, as the same prespective for my father too. However, my dad has a girlfriend, she is the biggest, gold digging, shemale, whore i've seen in my life such a bitch.
She makes you feel like shit, she trys to be young and copies youngster clothes but she's older. She's fucking wierd and pathetic, her daughter is retarded, 1 of them is ok and well as the other one over-confident.
My dad pays for all the bills and everything, she only pays for the food, and she can't even do that! She buys the most skankyest food ever, and she can't cook.
It's bloody ridiculous, she trys to make me angry, so I don't come again to she wins, and when I get angry I can tell she thinks she's won because she starts talking lots and acting all happy and isn't pulling faces to get my dads attention.
Reply with your past experience of your mum and dad.

Haha, i’m making her life a shit whole, thanks for posting comments.

WA1T! 1 H4vnt g1v2n mai suggeschun y3t!
If you REALLY want to piss her off, sabotage dat bitch!

item.title: Parents (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Don’t do anything that bitch tells you to do, she will get fed up and leave the house. Once shes out party like theres no tomorrow.

Neglect her
Exclude her from family activities
Prank her a lot
Show no respect around her

Be a daddies boy around dad but when hes gone fuckn’ shove her where she belongs.

item.title: Parents (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:25, topic:377447”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=473344.msg3462226#msg3462226 date=1294563622]
Well there is a big difference between death and a divorce.
[/quote]
So? It’s still a big deal. Knowing that not only your parents don’t love each other, but that you will not get to see them as much.[/quote]When a person dies, you know for a fact that you will never see them again.

Read full topic

item.title: Parents (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:22, topic:377447”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=473344.msg3462078#msg3462078 date=1294551132]

suck it up? parents divorce all the time learn to do deal with and not let it control your life.

Well that’s a bit rude. People die all the time, but if someone you knew died, especially someone you loved, would you like someone to say “suck it up”?
He’s obviously going through a hard time, be a little more sympathetic.
[/quote]Who the fuck died?[/quote]
Nobody, that was a comparison.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Same thing happened to me awhile back.

My Dad’s golding digging girlfriend took him for $68,000 and he’s now addicted to heroin, haven’t spoken to him in 3 years. (He owes me a Ps2…)

My mom’s epic boyfriend went back with his ex-wife, shit got real.

Nothing really to avoid this situation just treat it as a cinematic adventure.

Read full topic

item.title: Parents (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

If my parents split up, unless the guy is rich and would buy me things i would knock that fucking faggot the fuck out if he touches my mom. (Men in our family are really protective)
I would cheer my dad on if he picks up a hot girl. (as he would do for me)

Anyone else with me :D!

Read full topic

item.title: Parents (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:11, topic:377447”]My Parents split up when i was 11. Im now 14 But I have 3 younger brothers. One has autism. So Espically the on with autism was getting quite stressed hearing the argueing and fighting. So tbh I’m Quite glad my parents split up. It Stop the fighting it Keeps Peace with out dad. we go and stay at his house for weekends Thats just my life.
OP:
Entinity X Try avoiding stress in everyway And have a Talk to your dad about her. tell him how she makes you feel.[/quote][quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:377447”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473344.msg3461550#msg3461550 date=1294522150]
The divorce rates are extremely high nowadays…

Luckily my parents have been married 20 years and still going strong
[/quote]
Same
thats the awesome part about being armenian though, its considered shameful to devorce, which is why we have the #3 in least divorce rates

OT
That sucks, but does she pick on you or anything?[/quote][quote=“Clawz fury, post:8, topic:377447”]My parents; Well, you could say they “split up” but anyways, I was completely crushed because I have a strong relationship with my dad, and I barely saw him. I was lucky too see him once or twice a month.

I can see they are moving past there differences, they are having more fun together, and I get too see my dad more

@OP: Tell your dad that the girlfriend touched you in weird places.[/quote]

@PLayRooney, it’s harder then that, i’m not like that, let’s say i’m not a very confident person, i’m quite shy, I have alot of respect, and I was bought up well with manners and politeness.

@drubrkletern, She picks on me all the time, as well as my sisters, makes us do all the washing up and cleaning dishes and even make her cup of tea’s, where as she doesn’t ask her daughters don’t do jack shit, but me and my dad do have great laughs about taking the piss :D.

@Clawz Fury, lmfao, stupid idea, yet effective, I like it (won’t work though) ;p.

Thanks everyone for posting their family privacy I really appreciate it, I feel alot better.

Read full topic

My Parents split up when i was 11. Im now 14 But I have 3 younger brothers. One has autism. So Espically the on with autism was getting quite stressed hearing the argueing and fighting. So tbh I’m Quite glad my parents split up. It Stop the fighting it Keeps Peace with out dad. we go and stay at his house for weekends Thats just my life.
OP:
Entinity X Try avoiding stress in everyway And have a Talk to your dad about her. tell him how she makes you feel.

Read full topic

I can see they are moving past there differences, they are having more fun together, and I get too see my dad more
